name: Alyssa Chen
persona: Alyssa is a dedicated psychology major who is passionate about understanding human behavior. While her CGPA is just below 3.0, she consistently sets goals for herself and works hard to achieve them, even if she sometimes struggles with test anxiety. Alyssa is persistent and rarely gives up, showing strong perseverance in the face of academic challenges. She is working on improving her study habits and self-discipline to reach her full academic potential.
